info.name: WorkFlowy Sliding Wide Page for 1920x1080 Screen R
info.description:
Does what it says on the tin (this dynamically adjusts the page width as the browser width changes).

The screenshot gives an example of this theme applied to a particular userstyle (you can see/try/get these and other userstyles at my profile page), yet it also works fine with WorkFlowy's themes.
info.additionalInfo: This style requires that WorkFlowy's "Full width page" feature NOT be enabled.
